name: Street Light
info: Streetlights provide lighting to increase visibility and promote road safety for drivers and pedestrians. Street lights, also known as street lamps, illuminate roadways, parking lots, sidewalks, and other public areas.

name: Flood Light
info: ­Floodlight luminaire comprises die-cast aluminium Control gear and LED housing with toughened glass fixed with a clamp. This luminaire is recommended for illuminating Area lighting, Facade lighting, monument lighting, security lighting, etc.

name: Ni-Cd Battery
info: KPL, KPM, and KPH nickel 65408aee0771fa340bc53bd7 offer a wide range of low, medium, and high discharge rates and capacities. They boast a flexible solution for all types of industrial applications. It is typically used in power backup and bulk energy storage applications. Its cell has thick plates to provide a large capacity reserve for long-duration discharge such as emergency lighting, alarms, railway signaling, DC instrumentation, and photovoltaic system.

name: CONTROL TRANSFORMER
info: A control transformer is a transformer that is used to step down the voltage to power the control devices of a circuit or machine. The reduced voltage provides a much safer environment for technicians working on the equipment. Residential heating, ventilating, air conditioning systems and other machines use reduced voltage for the controls, thermostats, relays, and contactors. Control transformers are often referred to as power supplies.

name: POWER TRANSFORMER
info: A power transformer is a static machine used for transforming power from one circuit to another without changing the frequency. As there are no rotating or moving parts, a transformer is classified as a static device. The transformer operates on an AC supply.

name: CURRENT TRANSFORMER
info: A current transformer is defined as an instrument transformer working on the principle of variable flux. The current transformer as a device protects & measures any power system. CT is available as single, double, or multi-ratio units.

name: POTENTIAL TRANSFORMER
info: These potential transformers are usually fitted with switchboards, electrical panels, the motor control centre (MCC), etc. as isolated low voltage power for voltmeter, indicating lamp, and for small control voltages.

name: EPR / RUBBER CABLE
info: EPR cable is used widely across many industries ranging from industries involved in water, renewable energy, distribution and power networks, nuclear and thermal power stations, airports, marine, defence, telecommunications, windmills, building, mining, onshore, and offshore applications, ship wiring, railways, automation, audio-visual and manufacturing industries, these 65408aee0771fa340bc53bd6 can be suitable for a huge number of applications

name: AUTOMOTIVE BATTERY
info: The reliability of your truck and automated equipment begins with a reliable battery, whether you need loaders, dozers, excavators, scrapers, or trucks, your dealer can pull the right industry system together from the largest selection of equipment on earth.

name: INSTRUMENTATION CABLE
info: Instrumentation 65408aee0771fa340bc53bd6 can be utilized in process plants to connect instruments for communicating with each other. Usually, they take their place in industrial plants such as refineries or petrol deposits, steel plants, or any manufacturing units. They can be screened, armoured, laid up in pairs, triads, quads, etc. They can be insulated in PVC, PE, XLPE, and HEPR and sheathed in PUR, LSF, PVC, and PE.

name: LIGHTING ARRESTER
info: The circuit which is protected from the strokes of lightning with the help of a protection device is known as a lightning arrester. Here the lightning stroke is nothing but surges with high transient voltage, arcs of isolation, spark, and surge currents because of lightning, etc. These devices are used to defend the power systems by forwarding the high voltage surges in the direction of the ground.

name: EARTHING STRIPS
info: Earthing Strip systems can be depicted as something that is completely safe, reliable, durable, and efficiently designed, when compared with PVC/galvanized conduit piping. The conduits seem to be very much vulnerable to being damaged while operating the machine. The design of the tray systems is such that it is flexible and can be installed anywhere effortlessly adjacent to the machines.

name: EARTHING ELECTRODE
info: The primary function of the earthing electrode is the protection of persons That’s it. It is a fact that we live on Earth! And it is vital to earth-exposed metal parts of electrical equipment to avoid electrocution by indirect contact should an insulation fault occur. The second function of an earth electrode is to minimize common mode disturbances external to the LV installation.

name: EHV-GIS/AIS
info: EHV-GIS stands for Extra High Voltage Gas Insulated Switchgear. It is a type of high-voltage electrical switchgear that is used to control and protect electrical power transmission and distribution systems.

name: HV/LV CAPACITORS
info:
HL Capacitors, on the other hand, are designed for high-voltage applications and are commonly used in industrial and utility-scale power systems. They typically operate at voltages greater than 600 volts and can range from a few hundred kilovolts to several megavolts.

LV Capacitors are designed for low-voltage applications and are commonly used in residential and commercial buildings, as well as small industrial applications. They typically operate at voltages up to 600 volts and are available in a wide range of sizes and capacitance ratings.

Both HL and LV Capacitors are used to improve the efficiency and reliability of electrical systems by storing and releasing electrical energY.

name: RELAY
info: The relays are used to transfer electricity for high voltage or frequency applications. We offer general purpose miniature relays with LED indication and 3 poles. It is ideal for power and sequence control, instrumentation, industrial controls and automation systems.

name: CABLE FAULT LOCATOR
info: The initial fault analysis provides the basis for determining the subsequent procedure in the fault location process. During pre-location, the position of the fault is roughly located. The subsequent pin-pointing enables precise determination of the cable fault. Cable identification is used to identify the defective cable in a route. You can use various measurement methods depending on the type of fault and cable type.

name: I/O CONVERTER
info: It can do the Conversion of standard signals and temperature in 2 channels.

name: Solenoid Valves
info: A solenoid valve is an electrically controlled valve. The valve features a solenoid, which is an electric coil with a movable ferromagnetic core (plunger) in its center. In the rest position, the plunger closes off a small orifice. An electric current through the coil creates a magnetic field.

name: TRANSDUCERS
info: Transducers are also equipped with an interface to which a PC with the corresponding software can be connected for programming or accessing & executing useful ancillary functions. The usual modes of connection, the types of measured variables, their ratings, the transfer characteristic for each output, etc. are the main parameters that have to be programmed.

name: ELECTRICIAN'S TESTER
info: We provide a wide range of Electrician Tester which include Battery testing equipment, Earth Testing, electrician Accessories, Insulation resistance testing, Loop and RDC Testing, low resistance ohmmeter, Motor & generator testing, etc.

name: AXIAL FLOW FAN
info: An Axial Flow Fan or Industrial Axial Fan uses a propeller to draw the air into it, and discharge it, in the same axial direction. A Centrifugal Blower draws the air into the inlet of the blower housing with one of seven types of wheels.

name: CENTRIFUGAL  FAN
info: A centrifugal fan is a mechanical device for moving air or other gases in a direction at an angle to the incoming fluid. Centrifugal fans often contain a ducted housing to direct outgoing air in a specific direction or across a heat sink; such a fan is also called a blower, blower fan, or squirrel-cage fan.

name: FCBC
info: FCBC is basically a UPS for delivering regulated output voltage of 48V DC at 4 Amps when loaded fully. Alternatively, a battery backup is also provided wherein, the battery is charged when AC mains is present. It can be used at Power Stations, Sub-Station, Switchgear Stations, Metal Industries, Housing Colonies, Chemical plants, etc.

name: INDUSTRIAL UPS
info: The Industrial UPS is designed to operate in a rugged, often harsh environment where temperatures are extreme, airborne contaminants are present, and power quality is often very poor. A holistic approach including proper maintenance and testing of the entire system including UPS, 65408aee0771fa340bc53bd7, chargers, inverters, and static switches is required to ensure optimum performance throughout the life of the system.

name: SOLAR WATER PUMP
info: A solar water pump system is essentially an electrical pump system in which the electricity is provided by one or several PhotoVoltaic (PV) panels. The water is often pumped from the ground or stream into a storage tank that provides a gravity feed, so energy storage is not needed for these systems.

name: SOLAR STREET LIGHT
info: Solar street lighting system uses the photovoltaic technology to convert the sunlight into DC electricity through solar cells. The generated electricity can either be used directly during the day or may be stored in the 65408aee0771fa340bc53bd7 for use during night hours.

name: SOLAR PV MODULE
info: Photovoltaic module means a device used to convert light to electricity that includes an array of individual solar cells containing photosensitive material (such as silicon), wiring or circuitry that transports energy from the cells out of the module, and layers that protect the solar cells and wiring or circuitry from external stresses and the surrounding environment.

name: SOLAR SMART MODULE
info: Smart modules are a type of solar panel that has a power optimizer embedded into the solar module at the time of manufacturing. Typically the power optimizer is embedded in the junction box of the solar module. Power optimizers attached to the frame of a solar module, or connected to the photovoltaic circuit through a connector, are not properly considered smart modules.Smart modules are different from traditional solar panels because the power electronics embedded in the module offers enhanced functionality such as panel-level maximum power point tracking, monitoring, and enhanced safety.

name: SOLAR OFF-GRID POWER PACKS
info: In an off grid solar system you can store the excess power produced by a solar panel in the solar battery. You can use the stored power at nights or when the panels are not generating the power.

name: SOLAR ON-GRID POWER PACKS
info: Solar on-grid power packs are ready to use solar power solutions which convert solar energy into electrical energy using inverters for ready consumption. In an on-grid system there are is no storage and electricity generated by the system is used by consumers directly.

name: BASIC ENERGY METER
info: Basic meters calculate your energy usage by totaling the kWhs between a “start read date” and an “end read date”. These dates relate to the date(s) a meter reader visits your property to take a meter read (every 3 months).

name: MULTIFUNCTION METER
info: Multifunction Energy Meters are used for monitoring electrical installations. A Multifunction energy meter monitors and measures all the electrical parameters such as voltage, active power, apparent power, current, power factor, reactive power, Active energy, phase angle and so on.

name: ENERGY & PROCESS MONITOR
info: Energy Monitoring is the process of monitoring energy consumption, whether that's an individual asset or an entire building. Energy monitoring provides vital insight that can help to control and conserve energy in the future.

name: BRANCH CIRCUIT MONITOR
info: Branch Circuit Monitoring enables users to track power usage effectiveness (PUE) from a central location. Branch circuit monitoring is the process of collecting, trending, and reporting on electrical capacity and power usage data on branch circuits.

name: PUSH BUTTONS
info: A push-button or simply button is a simple switch mechanism to control some aspect of a machine or a process. Buttons are typically made out of hard material, usually plastic or metal. The surface is usually flat or shaped to accommodate the human finger or hand, so as to be easily depressed or pushed.

name: SELECTOR SWITCH
info: A selector switch can control on or off of different currents circuit by rotating the handle. Common used for control consisting of a mechanical or electrical or electronic device for making or breaking or changing the connections in a circuit.

name: Pneumatic Valve
info: A pneumatic valve is a device that is used to control or modulate the flow of air (or another inert gas) in a pneumatic system. They do so by controlling the air or gas at the source, regulating its passage as needed into tubing, pipes, or devices in an automated pneumatic system.

name: Electromagnetic Valve
info: Magnetic valves are the most frequently used control elements in fluidics. Their tasks are to shut off, release, dose, distribute or mix fluids. Solenoid valves are control units which, when electrically energized or de-energized, either shut off or allow fluid flow. The actuator takes the form of an electromagnet. When energized, a magnetic field builds up which pulls a plunger or pivoted armature against the action of a spring.

name: Flow Meter
info: A flow meter (or flow sensor) is an instrument used to measure linear, nonlinear, mass or volumetric flow rate of a liquid or a gas. When choosing flowmeters, one should consider such intangible factors as familiarity of plant personnel, their experience with calibration and maintenance, spare parts availability, and mean time between failure history, etc., at the particular plant site. It is also recommended that the cost of the installation be computed only after taking these steps.

name: ILLUMINATED SWITCH
info: A pilot light switch illuminates when the switch is in the ON position, to alert you that a light that's out of site at the switch (such as an outdoor, basement or closet light) is on. Lighted Toggles. Some toggle switches have lighted handles, while others are only lighted around the toggle's edge.

name: Ultrasonic Flowmeter
info: Ultrasonic flowmeters use sound waves to determine the velocity of a fluid flowing in a pipe. At no flow conditions, the frequencies of an ultrasonic wave transmitted into a pipe and its reflections from the fluid are the same. Under flowing conditions, the frequency of the reflected wave is different due to the Doppler effect. When the fluid moves faster, the frequency shift increases linearly. The transmitter processes signals from the transmitted wave and its reflections to determine the flow rate.

name: PILOT LIGHTS
info: The term "pilot light" is also used occasionally for an electrical indicator light that illuminates to show that electrical power is available, or that an electrical device is operating. Such indicators were originally incandescent lamps or neon lamps, but now are usually LEDs.

name: CONTACT ELEMENTS
info: The contact elements are double break and have self-wiping contacts. The elements are interchangeable and can be stacked without additional hardware. 1 to 6 elements (NO or NC) can be used with pushbuttons and selector switches. For illuminated switches, 1 or 2 elements (NO or NC) can be used.

name: ACOUSTIC DG CANOPY
info: A compact structure and strong soundproof enclosure with an elegant appearance are easy to be assembled or disassembled and reduce noise effectively. A famous brand engine can be chosen by the buyer. The running is reliable.

name: SOLID CORE POST INSULATOR
info: Solid core insulators is an insulator of generally columnar shape, it have one insulator unit or an assembly of such units and is intended to give rigid support to a live part which is insulated from earth or from another live part.

name: PORCELAIN INSULATORS
info: Porcelain insulators are the most widely applied insulator in electrical transmission & distribution systems. From salty seaside substations to highly corrosive petrochemical facilities along the equator, porcelain insulators enable continued operation at the designed voltages.

name: PIN INSULATORS
info: A pin insulator is a device that isolates a wire from a physical support such as a pin (a wooden or metal dowel of about 3 cm diameter with screw threads) on a telegraph or utility pole. It is a formed, single layer shape that is made out of a non-conducting material, usually porcelain or glass.

name: DISC INSULATORS
info: An insulator that is made up of high-grade wet processes like brown-green glazed is known as disc insulator. These insulators are used in transmission & distribution systems.For insulation material, its relative permittivity is high. It uses materials like non-porous or waterproof.

name: 3 PHASE STABILIZER
info: Three Phase Voltage Stabilizer consists of very simple electronic control circuit for monitoring and controlling voltage, repair & maintenance of which is very easy. Generally Voltage is low during day time and high during night hours.

name: 1 PHASE STABILIZER
info: The main purpose of a single phase voltage stabilizer is to provide constant voltage to a load even during voltage fluctuations. Every electric device at your place is designed in a way that works correctly under different levels of voltage.

name: INDUSTRIAL CONNECTOR
info: Industrial Connectors are used to join subsections of circuits together. Usually, a connector is used where it may be desirable to disconnect the subsections at some future time: power inputs, peripheral connections, or boards which may need to be replaced.

name: Pressure 65408aee0771fa340bc53be2
info: A pressure sensor is a device for pressure measurement of gases or liquids. Pressure is an expression of the force required to stop a fluid from expanding, and is usually stated in terms of force per unit area. A pressure sensor usually acts as a transducer; it generates a signal as a function of the pressure imposed. For the purposes of this article, such a signal is electrical.

name: CABLE LUGS
info: As lugs are used for connecting electrical devices and 65408aee0771fa340bc53bd6, most of such connectors are available in rubber or plastic insulated sheets. This ensures safe handling. Usually one end of the electrical lug is used for connecting a cable to an electrical device.

name: CABLE TERMINALS
info: Terminal blocks are used to secure and/or terminate wires and, in their simplest form, consist of several individual terminals arranged in a long strip. Terminals are useful for connecting wiring to a ground or, in the case of electrical power, for connecting electrical switches and outlets to the mains.

name: METAL CABLE GLAND
info: Metal cable glands provide protected cable entry into enclosures or electrical equipment, securing 65408aee0771fa340bc53bd6 or wires while maintaining enclosure sealing requirements.

name: GI SHROUDED DSL BUSBAR SYSTEMS
info: GI shrouded (DSL) busbar system are used for the electrification of mobile equipment. Shrouded bus bar is a safe, economical and low maintenance way to solve mobile electrification requirement. Systems can be designed to accommodate 60 to 1200 amperes.

name: BOLT JOINTS BUSBSAR FOR EOT CRANES
info: Shrouded Bus Bar (DSL) system are used for the electrification of mobile equipment. Shrouded bus bar is a safe, economical and low maintenance way to solve mobile electrification requirement. Systems can be designed to accommodate 60 to 1200 amperes.

name: Industrial Networking
info: Industrial networks can be defined as communication of data on a large scale. They are made to cater to real time needs. Industrial networks used in enterprises are known as enterprise networks or corporate networks. They include LANs and WANs to transfer data between various systems in a same building.

name: Industrial RFID
info: RFID uses radio waves produced by a reader to detect the presence of (then read the data stored on) an RFID tag. Tags are embedded in small items like cards, buttons, or tiny capsules. These readers also use radio waves in some systems to write new information to the tags.

name: Human Machine Interface (HMI)
info: A human machine interface — or HMI for short — is a control terminal on machinery to let operators monitor machine functions and adjust them as needed. This interaction is through a graphical user interface — GUI for short —that allows communications to and from supervisory controls and machine HMIs.

name: SAFETY 65408aee0771fa340bc53be2
info: Balluff's safe I/O modules combine safety and automation technology with IO-Link technology. This provides sensor and actuator signals while also being used for safety applications. With this universal interface the integration of 65408aee0771fa340bc53be4 technology easier than ever.. Safety sensor switches are used in machines and other industrial applications to prevent accidental contact with live electrical connections. Safety sensor switches work together with hinged, sliding, or lift-off guards and barriers. The power supply to the machine is disconnected as soon as the guard is opened.

name: 65408aee0771fa340bc53be3CAMERAS
info: Originally developed for surveillance and military operations, thermal cameras are now widely used for building inspections (moisture, insulation, roofing, etc.), firefighting, autonomous vehicles and automatic braking, skin temperature screening, industrial inspections, scientific research, and much more.

name: CORONA CAMERAS
info: A high sensitivity colour video camera with a resolution of 768 x 576 pixels which can operate at light levels down to 0.0004 lux, rendering it capable of seeing corona streamers under near dark conditions.

name: VERTICAL SINGLE/HORIZONTAL DOUBLE MOUNTING SIREN
info: Siren, noisemaking device producing a piercing sound of definite pitch. Used as a warning signal.The simplest version of a siren is a mechanical device that pushes an air stream against a rotating perforated disk. As the disk spins, the airflow will be alternately interrupted and allowed to pass. The ensuing fluctuation in air pressure produces a series of regular pressure waves that we perceive as sound.

name: BATTERY OPERATED SIREN
info:
Battery Operated Motor Siren 220 V AC with the external diameter of 80 / 100 mm which makes the output of 40 W sound volume.
Suitable for warning information of small hoist,light transfer cars and the inside of small vessel.

name: WALL MOUNTING SIREN
info: Hand operated Siren Wall Mounting and floor mounting type pointing out only a few fields of operation if may be referred to construction areas,quarries,troop training grounds,catastrophes,camps,skiing grounds,school,public buildings,mines etc.

name: POWER TRANSFORMER
info: A power transformer is a static machine used for transforming power from one circuit to another without changing the frequency. As there is no rotating or moving parts, a transformer is classified as a static device. Transformer operates on an AC supply.

name: DISTRIBUTION TRANSFORMER
info: A distribution transformer is the type of transformer that performs the last voltage transformation in a distribution grid. It converts the voltage used in the transmission lines to one suitable for household and commercial use, typically down to 240 volts.

name: Multimeter
info: A digital multimeter is a test tool used to measure two or more electrical values—principally voltage (volts), current (amps) and resistance (ohms). It is a standard diagnostic tool for technicians in the electrical/electronic industries. A typical multimeter can measure voltage, resistance, and current, in which case it is also known as a volt-ohm-milliammeter (VOM), as the unit is equipped with voltmeter, ammeter, and ohmmeter functionality.

name: Clamp Meter
info: A clamp meter is a clothespin-shaped instrument that can be clamped around a live wire in order to measure the current it's carrying. As a measurement principle, clamp meters detect the magnetic field emitted by current flowing in a wire in order to measure the current value.

name: DIgital Insulation Tester
info: Digital insulation tester are used to check electrical circuits for faults. The further the distance the current has to travel along the wire, the larger the wire gauge (diameter) must be to be able to carry enough current to counteract the effects of resistance. An insulation tester performs the basic measuring function a megohmmeter does—measuring very high resistance values by sending a high voltage signal into the object being tested—and it often does much more; it usually performs more functions, including more complex testing and recording of measurements.

name: Contact Resistance Meter
info: Contact Resistance Meter (Model:PCRM200S) is a digital micro-ohmmeter, specially designed to measure extremely low resistance in micro ohm. The resistance of contacts can be crudely estimated by comparing the results of a four terminal measurement to a simple two-lead measurement made with an ohmmeter.

name: High Voltage Detectors
info: Motwane’s HV detector series provides an exceptional combination of user comfort and safety in one electrical safety device. The optimum LED layout, integrated audible signals, and innovative self-test features form the basic elements in all voltage detection equipment types. HV detector series are designed in contact type and non-contact type.

name: Battery Ground Fault Locator
info:
Floating DC systems are the backbone of any substations. Malfunctioning of a DC system/non-availability of sound DC system can lead to a disaster in the substation and hence it is a necessity that the floating DC systems in the substations should be free from any fault. 

The DC ground locator, MGFL, helps substation engineers in locating, tracing and pinpointing DC ground faults in any floating DC system of up to 300V DC in online and offline conditions. The MGFL is a portable lightweight instrument used to locate the ground faults in DC systems. It consists of a transmitter unit and a receiver unit. The transmitter is connected to a live/non-live floating system of up to 300V DC preferably on the DC bus. It then transmits low frequencies and low voltage signals in the DC system without affecting the sensitive operation of relays. The transmitted signal is then tracked by the receiver to locate the faulted feeder and tracks it up to the point of fault. The instrument balances the capacitance of the DC system to automatically detect any faults. The instrument incorporates advanced signal processing to eliminate noise in the DC system and is very sensitive to any ground faults. The instrument is fully automatic and detects earth faults/mixing of sources easily.

name: SMART 65408aee0771fa340bc53be2
info: A smart sensor is a device that takes input from the physical environment and uses built-in compute resources to perform predefined functions upon detection of specific input and then process data before passing it on.

name: Inductive 65408aee0771fa340bc53be2
info: An Inductive sensor is used to measure position . They are usually used within harsh environments as they are generally robust and can deliver stable signals even in hostile environments. They use a contactless principle which gives them longer life and makes them highly reliable.

name: Photoelectric 65408aee0771fa340bc53be2
info: A photoelectric sensor is used to detect the presence (or absence) of an object, or for measuring the distance between a point and an object. It uses visible red light or infrared light from a transmitter and also has a photoelectric receiver. The sensor senses all kinds of materials. It has longer life, long sensing range and very reliability. Very fast response time and less costly. Diffuse photoelectric sensor detects small objects including color mark and label detection.

name: Safety Magnetic 65408aee0771fa340bc53be2
info: Safety sensor switches are used in machines and other industrial applications to prevent accidental contact with live electrical connections. Safety sensor switches work together with hinged, sliding, or lift-off guards and barriers. The power supply to the machine is disconnected as soon as the guard is opened.

name: WELLGLASS LIGHT
info: Energy-efficient wellglass is designed for various industrial applications with excellent thermal management offering durability and superior performance thereby reducing operational costs. use in the hazardous environment of Coal mines as well as for the Oil and Gas industry.

name: BOLLARD/LANDSCAPE LIGHT
info: Landscape lights are a type of lighting fixture that is commonly used to illuminate pathways and landscapes for pedestrian use and safety. This LED Indirect Bollard comprises pressure die-cast aluminium housing with pipe and polycarbonate diffuser.

name: FLAMEPROOF LIGHT
info: The Flameproof light fittings are renowned in the industry for their energy efficiency, ensuring continuity of operations, providing ample light to the surroundings, and easy installation.

name: FIBER OPTIC CABLE
info: Fiber optic 65408aee0771fa340bc53bd6 use light pulses to transfer data signals up to hundreds of miles and they have higher bandwidth and throughput than conventional electrical communication 65408aee0771fa340bc53bd6. The type of optical fiber to be used is dependent on the application, the distance from which the signals are required to travel, and the speed of transmission. The installation and environmental requirements also decide the cable construction.

name: E BEAM 65408aee0771fa340bc53bd6
info: In the wire and cable industry, E-beam irradiation provides enhanced cross-linking and polymer modification for wire, cable, and tubing products. The processing technique, more often than not, doesn’t require any additives, nor does it generate any hazardous chemical by-products. In addition, the E-beam crosslinking does not require the hours of cure time needed for other conventional chemical cross-linking methods.

name: LEAD ACID BATTERY
info: The Lead Acid 65408aee0771fa340bc53bd7 designed for Home UPS ensure the availability of uninterrupted and regulated power during mains failure or dip in input voltage. Featuring sophisticated digital control and display systems they assure steady power to protect your sensitive equipment from power fluctuation and failure.

name: VRLA
info: VRLA is a high-performance battery designed to meet the demands of a wide range of industrial applications. The VRLA range is modular in structure and is capable of accommodating a wide spectrum of capacities depending on the application. VRLA incorporates cutting-edge technology offering an unbeatable value proposition for demanding applications in backup power.

name: OUTDOOR TRANSFORMER
info:
This family of current transformers is dedicated to high-demanding applications such as substations.
The TPO family of transformers are cast in hydrophobic cycloaliphatic epoxy resin (HCEP), capable of withstanding outdoor environmental conditions. The HCEP material offers superior arc track, ozone, and ultraviolet-resistive properties while maintaining physical strength

name: INDOOR TRANSFORMER
info:
Indoor-type current transformers are generally used for low-voltage circuits and are further classified into wound-type, bar-type, and window-type transformers. A current transformer without a primary conductor, but with primary insulation which can be fitted directly over a conductor or busbar.  
The transformers are designed and manufactured in conformity with the following standards:
IEC, VDE, ANSI, BS, GOST, and CSN.

name: SURGE ARRESTER
info: A surge protector is a device that is made to protect electronic equipment from unwanted power surges or "spikes." It takes only a tiny amount of voltage increase to damage most of today's sensitive electronics. These voltage irregularities are caused by many factors such as lightning, large appliances turning on, home wiring problems, and problems with a local power provider.

name: HEAT EXCHANGER
info: A heat exchanger is a device that transfers heat from one medium to another, a Hydraulic Oil Cooler or example will remove heat from hot oil by using cold water or air. . Heat is transferred by conduction through the exchanger materials which separate the mediums being used. A shell and tube heat exchanger passes fluids through and over tubes, whereas an air-cooled heat exchanger passes cool air through a core of fins to cool a liquid.

name: COMMERCIAL UPS
info: For IT environments that are so vital and where downtime can cost hundreds of thousands of dollars per outage, we understand how important it is that your applications always work. Whether you want to extend the service life of your UPS and battery system, improve efficiency, or increase availability, we have a service solution to meet your needs.

name: SERVO STABILIZER
info: Servo stabilizers enhance the life and operating efficiency of sensitive electronic equipment by providing precise voltage. Stabilizers designed to their rated capacity – Underrating StabiliZer decreases efficiency and compromises long-term reliability.

name: SOUND PROOF ENCLOSURES
info: Sound Proof Enclosures are ideal for Generators, compressors, blowers, sewing machines, hydraulic machines, cable machines, and many others. Sound Proof Enclosures are widely used for internal as well as external use in many industries. Further, they protect machines and generators from all weather conditions, fire, humidity & dust.

name: AUDIO METRIC CHAMBER
info: We are offering a special class of highly efficient Audio Metric Chamber. Designed to perfection, Sound Proof chamber is extensively used in the industry & Medical industries in order to prevent the external sound interface with the internal organizational environment.

name: CABLE FAULT LOCATOR
info: The initial fault analysis provides the basis for determining the subsequent procedure in the fault location process. During pre-location, the position of the fault is roughly located. The subsequent pin-pointing enables precise determination of the cable fault. Cable identification is used to identify the defective cable in a route. You can use various measurement methods depending on the type of fault and cable type.

name: THICKNESSGAUGE
info: Thickness gauge packed with standard measurement features and software options. This unique instrument is compatible with the complete range of dual-element and single-element thickness gauge transducers, making this innovative instrument an all-in-one solution for virtually every thickness gauge application.

name: FLAW DETECTOR
info:
Flaw detectors provide unmatched capabilities for locating discontinuities and other flaws. A wide range of software options is available for enhanced flaw detector inspection.

Measurement features and application-specific options for flaw detection applications that include the location and sizing of hidden cracks, voids, disbands, and similar discontinuities in welds, forgings, turbines, and other structural components.

name: VIDEOSCOPES/BORESCOPES
info: Videoscopes, also known as video borescopes, provide a clear view of inspection areas inaccessible to other NDT methods. Their flexibility and durability provide advanced inspection capabilities for bores, holes, pipes, cavities, and other challenging applications.

name: PROBES & CONNECTORS
info: NDT probes and transducers are high-quality inspection equipment available in a range of frequencies, configurations, connection styles, and cable types. Probes are a type of non-destructive testing tool. Transducers are used to convert electrical signals into ultrasound.

name: HANDHELD XRF ANALYZER
info: X-Ray Fluorescence non-destructive technique for measuring elemental composition from magnesium (Mg) to uranium (U), from parts per million to 100%. Handheld XRF analyzer are portable devices that can be used on location for immediate, lab-quality results to help you determine the next course of action and where it’s needed.

name: Vision Sensor
info: Vision 65408aee0771fa340bc53be2 are used in the packaging industry and intralogistics as a solution for various image-based inspection tasks. They are compact image processing systems in sensor format which provide everything needed to solve inspection applications in a housing suitable for industrial environments. Vision 65408aee0771fa340bc53be2 are ideal for compartment fine positioning, code reading, presence detection as well as measuring and counting.

name: Switching 65408aee0771fa340bc53be2
info: Switching 65408aee0771fa340bc53be2 detect whether an object is present or not present. There is a vast range of switching 65408aee0771fa340bc53be2 which includes: optical 65408aee0771fa340bc53be2. Inductive 65408aee0771fa340bc53be2, capacitive 65408aee0771fa340bc53be2, ultrasonic 65408aee0771fa340bc53be2, light curtains, fiber optic 65408aee0771fa340bc53be2, fork 65408aee0771fa340bc53be2, area 65408aee0771fa340bc53be2, and more.

name: Measuring 65408aee0771fa340bc53be2
info: A Measurement Sensor measures the position and dimensions of an object. Measuring 65408aee0771fa340bc53be2 have a vast range, including Optical Distance 65408aee0771fa340bc53be2, Ultrasonic Distance 65408aee0771fa340bc53be2, 65408aee0771fa340bc53be2 For Positioning, 65408aee0771fa340bc53be2 for Contour Measurement, Measuring Light Curtains, Measuring Fork 65408aee0771fa340bc53be2, Incremental Sensor, and more.

name: Proximity 65408aee0771fa340bc53be2
info: Proximity 65408aee0771fa340bc53be2 are the preferred choice for the majority of applications requiring accurate, non-contact detection of metallic objects in machinery or automation equipment. Proximity 65408aee0771fa340bc53be2 include Inductive 65408aee0771fa340bc53be2, Capacitive 65408aee0771fa340bc53be2, and Magnetic Field 65408aee0771fa340bc53be2.

name: Ultrasonic 65408aee0771fa340bc53be2
info: Ultrasonic 65408aee0771fa340bc53be2 are characterized by their reliability and outstanding versatility. Ultrasonic 65408aee0771fa340bc53be2 can be used to solve even the most complex tasks involving object detection or level measurement with millimetre precision because their measuring method works reliably under almost all conditions.

name: Photoelectric 65408aee0771fa340bc53be2
info: Photoelectric 65408aee0771fa340bc53be2 deliver long-distance, non-contact detection of metallic and non-metallic targets, accommodating variable target color and surface finish. High-frequency switching circuitry senses small, fast-moving objects, even against non-contrasting backgrounds. Photoelectric 65408aee0771fa340bc53be2 direct light beams – emitted by a laser diode or LED – toward a distant target.

name: Inductive 65408aee0771fa340bc53be2
info: Inductive 65408aee0771fa340bc53be2 are for non-contact detection of metallic targets at distances. Vacuum-encapsulated electronics and metal housings protect against shock, vibration, dust, dirt, and moisture, making inductive 65408aee0771fa340bc53be2 ideal for highly demanding conditions. An inductive sensor generates a magnetic field that is attenuated by a metal target. As a sensor nears its target, a sensing circuit detects the degree of attenuation and switches the output accordingly.

name: Condition Monitoring Sensor
info: Unscheduled stops and faults in the production process can be avoided using multi-functional condition monitoring 65408aee0771fa340bc53be2. These intelligent 65408aee0771fa340bc53be2 provide condition information that you can use to automate manual inspections. This condition data is also an important component of IIoT for implementing smart and flexible manufacturing.

name: Handheld Thermal Camera
info: Thermaln imaging camera is a non-contact inspection tool with 180° rotating optical block that allows users to safely and comfortably assess the condition of critical electrical and mechanical equipment in utility and manufacturing applications.

name: Gas Detection System
info: Optical Gas imaging camera with interchangeable lens options that detect methane, sulfur hexafluoride, ethylene, ammonia, and other gas emissions. Capable of both gas detection and radiometric temperature measurement for thermal inspections, the GF77 is ideal for electric power utilities, oil & natural gas operations, chemical/manufacturing facilities, the food and agriculture industry, and first responders.

name: Acoustic Imaging Camera
info: An acoustic Imaging Camera can help you locate pressurized leaks in compressed air systems or detect partial discharge from high-voltage electrical systems. This lightweight, one-handed solution can identify issues up to 10 times faster than traditional methods. Built with 124 microphones, precise acoustic image that visually displays ultrasonic information, even in loud industrial environments.

name: Machine vision Cameras
info: Designed to support a feature and sensor set to easily build robust and powerful systems faster. It offers flexible link speeds as well as the ability to control data transfer to the host.

name: Leakage Detection Cameras
info: An intelligent, easy-to-use imaging system designed to visually show pressurized leaks in compressed air systems and display partial discharge problems in high-voltage electrical systems. This lightweight, one-handed solution can help utility, manufacturing, and engineering professionals identify efficiency loss and potential failures up to 10 times faster than traditional methods.

name: Thermal Drones
info: Thermal-zoom drone payload enables 200 series and 300 pilots to see and measure thermal details, increasing the value and extending the lifetime of their drone fleet. Thermal cameras that put four times more pixels on target at every zoom level versus all competition and offer an unmatched 20x zoom capability.

name: ELECTRONIC PRESSURE SWITCH
info:
Electronic Pressure Switch employs a vapor-deposited semiconductor strain gauge sensor that is widely used in various industrial applications.

An Electronic Pressure Switch Applicable to a wide temperature range, all-welded structure, it is applicable to a wide range of applications from low-pressure to high-pressure with a Protection structure: IP67

name: EXPLOSION PROOF PRESSURE SWITCH
info: Explosion Proof Pressure Switch device is a dead band adjustable pressure switch. Due to the double snap action (using Belleville springs), it has excellent vibration resistance and is suitable for direct control of equipment.

name: LEVEL SWITCH
info: Liquid Level Gauge provides direct observation of the liquid level in a tank/vessel, rising and falling levels of the liquid inside the tank/vessel can be observed through the glass assembled in the gauge. The liquid level is discriminated in the form of different transparency of the two media.

name: FLOW SWITCH
info: Flow Switches for the direct control of fluid flow in pipelines and ducts. These switches are magnetically or mechanically actuated. This is a simple, reliable, and economical solution to control or monitor the flow.

name: Coating Thickness Measurement
info: The thickness gauge is a compact inline measuring system in a stable O-frame design with an aluminum roller and an integrated control cabinet. The system is used for precise thickness measurements of plastic strips and coatings material thickness and web widths. To obtain a cross profile of the material thickness, the sensor is traversed over the film. Keeping the sensor fixed at a particular position enables a thickness profile to be generated.

name: Infrared Temperature Measurement
info: These cameras are designed for non-contact measurement of surface temperatures. They enable efficient monitoring and control of temperature-critical processes both with low temperatures (e.g. in cooling chains) and with very high temperatures (e.g. in glass and metal processing). Their high thermal sensitivity makes these infrared cameras ideally suitable for precise and dynamic tasks.

name: Rotation Speed Sensor
info: Rotation speed 65408aee0771fa340bc53be2 are used to monitor, regulate and control mechanical drive systems and play a major role when it comes to protecting elements of a rotational system (e.g., in the engine, drive) from mechanical overload. The speed sensor is designed for industrial counting tasks and rotational speed applications. Regardless of the material, the sensor detects blades, gear wheels, nubs, and similar objects with the highest precision.

name: Limit Switch
info: Limit switches are non-contact in operation. They are used as an alternative to mechanical switches. The main advantage is their wear-free operating mode. They are noted for their insensitivity to corrosive ambient conditions and their virtually unlimited mechanical life.

name: Respiratory Safety
info:
3M Reusable Full-face respirator is designed to provide filtering protection against particulates, gases, and vapors present in many industrial applications.

The classic disposable N95 particulate respirator is designed to help provide comfortable, reliable worker respiratory protection against certain non-oil-based particles.

name: Body Safety
info: SKC has a variety of Body safety product which includes Dust protection suit,  chemical Splash Suit, Heat Resistant Suit, fire fighting Suit, type 1 Gas Tight Suit, AIR-Fed Reusable Suit, AIR-FED Suit, General Work Wear, and more..

name: Electrical Safety
info: We have a complete safety solution for electrical safety, a range that includes Electrical Mats, Electrical gloves, Earthing Rods, Electrical Boots, Electrical Helmets, and Electrical Safety kits.

name: Fire Sprinkler System
info: Fire Sprinkler System is an effective new alternative to traditional fire hazard protection. This technology can be effectively used for both Occupied and Unoccupied spaces. Aerosols are most effective in confined spaces like underground mines and do not affect oxygen concentration. Based on the type of fire hazard and fire load calculations, sprinkler systems are designed and installed.

name: PLC
info:
PLC ranges provide solutions for small, medium, and high-end applications. PLC platform offers different performance levels and is the ideal choice for high availability, extreme environments, condition monitoring, motion control, or safety solutions. 
PLC platform offers interoperability and compatibility in hardware and software from compact PLCs up to high-end and safety PLCs.

name: HMI
info: They reliably visualize the status of the machine and system components to be monitored by converting the output signals of the 65408aee0771fa340bc53be2 optically and acoustically. You can read the operating status of your machine or system at a glance on our displays and the LED signal indicators Smart Light. The advantage here is fast, unambiguous, and clear signaling, even from a distance.

name: AIR/DRUM CLUTCH
info: Air clutches help transfer torque between the engine and transmission, rather than providing stopping power. They rely on compressed air for engagement and disengagement. By controlling the air pressure applied to the clutch, you can achieve smooth controlled deceleration and even rapid stops. In addition, they offer quick and safe disengagement. Air-actuated brakes and clutches offer a number of advantages, such as fast response rates and safe operation. Since they are pneumatically actuated versus hydraulically actuated, the risk of spills, leaks and fires is eliminated.

name: AIR BRAKE
info: An air brake or, more formally, a compressed-air brake system, is a type of friction brake for vehicles in which compressed air pressing on a piston is used to apply the pressure to the brake pad or brake shoe needed to stop the vehicle. Air brakes use compressed air to make the brakes work. Air brakes are really 3 different braking systems: service brake, parking brake, and emergency brake. Air brakes are a good and safe way of stopping large and heavy vehicles.

name: DISC BRAKE SYSTEM
info: A disc brake is a type of brake that uses the calipers to squeeze pairs of pads against a disc or a "rotor" to create friction. This action slows the rotation of a shaft, such as a vehicle axle, either to reduce its rotational speed or to hold it stationary. The energy of motion is converted into waste heat which must be dispersed.

name: FLUID COUPLING
info: A fluid coupling or hydraulic coupling is a hydrodynamic or 'hydrokinetic' device used to transmit rotating mechanical power. It has been used in automobile transmissions as an alternative to a mechanical clutch. It also has widespread application in marine and industrial machine drives, where variable speed operation and controlled start-up without shock loading of the power transmission system is essential.

name: EOT Cranes
info: Electric overhead traveling crane or EOT crane is one of the most common types of overhead crane, called bridge cranes, which consist of parallel runways with a traveling bridge spanning the gap. We supply both single an double EOT Cranes

name: JIB Cranes
info: Jib Crane is a crane with a horizontal member, commonly known as the jib or boom. A jib is an operating arm that extends horizontally from the crane. The role of the jib is to support a movable hoist fixed to either a wall or pillar mounted on the floor.

name: Gantry or Goliath Cranes
info: The gantry crane’s basic purpose is to provide a solution to the shed/structures which are unable to take the load of the EOT crane. The gantry crane moves on the rail supported on floor level instead of the rail placed on the elevated level. This eliminates the need for workshop building and hence reduction in capital costs.

name: Electric Wire Rope
info: Electric Wire Rope Hoist, as the name suggests, utilizes electricity to lift heavy loading goods with the help of a drum wrapped with a rope. The rope hoist is employed to lift heavy loads up and down at the industries. These wire rope hoists may be useful and helpful where it is full of risk for a human to stand.

name: DSL & BUS Bar
info: DSL (Down Shop Lead) Bus bars are made up of highly electrically conductive metals and they distribute & carry power from a source to a destination or multiple destinations. They are used in EOT Cranes to supply power from the grid to the crane control panel.

name: Control Station
info: Control stations are used in particular in industrial and construction lifting plants to control gantry cranes, track cranes, jib cranes, wall-mounted jib cranes, tower cranes, and winches for construction sites; in the automation industry to command and control systems to manage machines and processes, thus reducing the need for human intervention; in stage technology to control the equipment used to move stage sets, curtains etc.; in the waste disposal industry to control the movement of machines and equipment.

name: Cordless Tools Drilling & Fasting
info: A cordless driver drill is a handheld power tool used for drilling holes and driving screws into various materials such as wood, metal, or plastic. Unlike traditional corded drills, cordless driver drills are powered by rechargeable 65408aee0771fa340bc53bd7 and do not require a power outlet. Cordless driver drills typically come with adjustable torque settings, allowing you to adjust the force applied to the screw or drill bit.

name: Corded Tools Drilling & Fasting
info: Corded drilling refers to the use of drilling machines or power drills that require a direct connection to a power source through a power cord. They are ideal for heavy-duty drilling tasks that require sustained power, such as drilling through concrete or metal. Additionally, they do not require frequent recharging, making them suitable for prolonged use.

name: Corded Tools Drilling & Fasting
info:
A typical drill kit includes a power drill, a battery or power cord, a charger, and a set of drill bits and screwdriver bits of various sizes and types.

Some common accessories and attachments may include: Drill bits, Screwdriver bits, Nut drivers, Hole saws, Spade bits, Masonry bits, Carrying case

name: Laser Instruments
info: The Cross Line and Plumb Spot Laser features an integrated magnetic pivoting base with quarter-inch thread front and rear-mounted magnets allowing flush attachment to metal track and steel.

name: Flowmeter for Water
info: The electromagnetic flowmeter is designed for pipes with diameter sizes ranging from DN06 to DN400 and is intended exclusively to measure flow rate in neutral and slightly aggressive liquids having a conductivity of more than 20 µS/cm.

name: Flowmeter for Gases
info: This flowmeter series is made for the measurement of especially large flow rates and use the calorimetric measuring principle. A heated sensor element is cooled down by the gas flow. This cooling effect depends on the flow velocity and the gas characteristics serve as a flow indication, the kind of cooling directly depends on the flow velocity and the kind of gas.

name: Flowmeter for Solid
info: This flowmeter is specially designed for use in neutral, slightly aggressive, solid-free liquids. Flowmeter is offered in different variants. The compact flowmeter with paddle wheel sensor is available in two variants: – standard signal output or – battery-powered indicator/totalizer variant without output.

name: Flowmeter for Oil
info: This positive displacement flow transmitter with the display is designed for use in slightly viscous fluid like glue, honey, or oil and specially to switch a valve and to establish a monitoring system or an on/Off control loop. The transmitter is made of a compact fitting and an electronic module that is quickly and easily connected together by a Quarter-Turn.

name: Coriolis Mass Flowmeter
info: This Coriolis flowmeter is made for the measurement of liquid and gas. It utilizes a unique torsion bar vibration system to vibrate the detector tube indirectly. When fluid flows, it detects the phase difference in order to directly measure the mass of the fluid. Because it directly obtains the mass flow rate, this flowmeter does not require the temperature and pressure compensation needed by volumetric flowmeters.

name: Vortex Flowmeter
info: This flowmeter uses ultrasonic wave 65408aee0771fa340bc53be2 placed outside the detector to detect differences in the phase of the waves, which indicate the formation of vortices. This makes it very precise in measuring the rate of liquid flow, making it suitable for applications that require high levels of accuracy.

name: CONTROL VALVES
info: A control valve is a device used to regulate or control the flow of fluids (liquids or gases) through a pipeline or process system. Control valves are widely used in industries such as oil and gas, chemical processing, water treatment, and power generation. They are critical components in the control of process variables such as flow rate, pressure, temperature, and level.

name: BALL VALVES
info: A ball valve is a shut-off valve that controls the flow of a liquid or gas by means of a rotary ball having a bore. By rotating the ball a quarter turn (90 degrees) around its axis, the medium can flow through or is blocked. They are characterized by a long service life and provide reliable sealing over the life span, even when the valve is not in use for a long time.

name: GLOBE VALVE
info: Globe valves are highly efficient for services requiring frequent operation and throttling when the pressure drop across the valve is about 20% of inlet pressure. Globe valves can be equipped with optional operators and are available with a variety of trims to match service requirements.

name: GATE VALVES
info: A gate valve is a type of valve that controls fluid flow through a pipeline by using a gate or wedge to block the fluid flow. The gate is usually rectangular or circular and is positioned in the flow path of the fluid. Gate valves are commonly used in applications where a full flow or no flow of fluid is required, such as in the oil and gas industry, water treatment plants, and chemical processing facilities.

name: BUTTERFLY VALVES
info: A butterfly valve is a type of valve that controls the flow of fluid through a pipeline by using a disc-shaped closure member that rotates around a central axis to regulate the flow. Butterfly valves are commonly used in applications requiring quick and reliable shutoff, such as in the chemical, water treatment, and power generation industries. Butterfly valves are available in a range of sizes and materials, and can be designed for high-pressure and high-temperature applications.

name: ANTI-CORROSION CONTROL VALVES
info: An anti-corrosion control valve is a type of valve that is designed to prevent or minimize corrosion in pipelines and other systems that carry fluids. Corrosion can occur when the fluid being transported reacts with the metal surfaces of the pipeline, causing them to deteriorate over time Overall, anticorrosion control valves are an important component in many industrial and commercial applications, particularly in industries such as oil and gas, chemical processing, and water treatment, where corrosion can be a significant problem.

name: ELECTRIC VALVES
info: An electric valve is a type of valve that is operated using an electric actuator. The actuator is typically powered by electricity, which allows for precise control over the valve's position and the flow of fluid or gas through the pipeline. Electric valves can be used in a wide range of applications, including industrial processes, building automation systems, and even home automation systems.

name: ANGLE VALVES
info: An angle valve is a type of valve that is designed to change the direction of fluid or gas flow in a pipeline. It has an L-shaped body with one inlet and one outlet that is connected at a 90-degree angle. The valve typically has a handle or knob that can be turned to open or close the valve.

name: HIGH PRESSURE VALVES
info: High-pressure valves are critical components in many industries, including oil and gas, chemical processing, power generation, and aerospace. They play a crucial role in ensuring the safe and efficient operation of equipment and systems that operate under high pressure. Proper maintenance and installation of high-pressure valves are essential to ensure they operate effectively and safely.

name: PRESSURE TRANSMITTERS
info: A pressure transmitter is a type of sensor used to measure the pressure of a fluid or gas in a pipeline or other container. It converts the pressure into an electrical signal that can be used to monitor and control the pressure of the system. Pressure transmitters can be used in a wide range of applications, including industrial processes, automotive systems, and medical devices. They are often used in situations where accurate and reliable pressure measurement is critical to the operation of the system.

name: LEVEL TRANSMITTER
info: A level transmitter is a type of sensor used to measure the level of liquids, slurries, or powders in tanks, vessels, or other containers. Level transmitters can be used in a wide range of applications, including industrial processes, water and wastewater treatment, and food and beverage production. They are often used in situations where accurate and reliable level measurement is critical to the operation of the system.

name: NEAR INFRARED MOISTURE SCANNER
info: A near-infrared moisture scanner, also known as a near-infrared moisture analyzer or near-infrared moisture sensor, is a device used to measure the moisture content of a material using near-infrared (NIR) spectroscopy. They can be used to measure the moisture content of solids, powders, and liquids, and they can provide accurate and reliable measurements even in harsh industrial environments.

name: Gas & Liquid Analyzer
info:
This product is a multifunctional digital differential pressure gauge with a liquid-filled highly sensitive silicon capacitance sensor for detecting micro
differential pressure featuring sensor module consisted of stainless diaphragm (SUS316L) for wetted parts. This can be used for variety of pressure media (Gases and fluids).

name: Drag Chain Cable
info: Drag chain 65408aee0771fa340bc53bd6, also known as drag 65408aee0771fa340bc53bd6, are specially designed 65408aee0771fa340bc53bd6 that are used in applications where 65408aee0771fa340bc53bd6 need to be moved continuously along a defined path. These 65408aee0771fa340bc53bd6 are typically installed in drag chains or cable carriers that are used to protect and guide the 65408aee0771fa340bc53bd6 along their path. Drag chain 65408aee0771fa340bc53bd6 are commonly used in industrial machinery and automation systems where the 65408aee0771fa340bc53bd6 are subjected to frequent motion, bending, and other mechanical stresses.

name: TRAILING 65408aee0771fa340bc53bd6
info:
Trailing 65408aee0771fa340bc53bd6, also known as festoon 65408aee0771fa340bc53bd6, are used in applications where 65408aee0771fa340bc53bd6 need to be suspended or hung from a fixed point and moved along a defined path. Trailing 65408aee0771fa340bc53bd6 are typically used in cranes, hoists, and other material handling equipment, where the 65408aee0771fa340bc53bd6 need to be able to move freely as the equipment moves. Trailing 65408aee0771fa340bc53bd6 are often designed with a high degree of flexibility and resistance to mechanical stress.

Trailing 65408aee0771fa340bc53bd6 are typically designed with specialized features such as high-temperature resistance, oil resistance, and flame retardancy, depending on the specific application requirements.

name: COMPOSITE 65408aee0771fa340bc53bd6
info:
Composite 65408aee0771fa340bc53bd6, also known as combination 65408aee0771fa340bc53bd6, are 65408aee0771fa340bc53bd6 that combine different types of electrical conductors and insulation materials within a single cable jacket. These 65408aee0771fa340bc53bd6 are designed to provide a range of electrical and mechanical properties to meet specific application requirements.

Composite 65408aee0771fa340bc53bd6 are commonly used in applications such as data transmission, control systems, and power distribution, particularly in industrial and commercial settings. They are often used to save space and simplify cable routing by combining multiple functions into a single cable.

name: EHV / HT / LT 65408aee0771fa340bc53bd6
info: EHV 65408aee0771fa340bc53bd6 are used for transmitting electricity at very high voltages, typically above 220 kV. These 65408aee0771fa340bc53bd6 are used for long-distance transmission of electricity from power generation plants to large urban areas. EHV 65408aee0771fa340bc53bd6 are designed to minimize power loss over long distances and are typically made of high-quality materials like cross-linked polyethylene (XLPE) or ethylene propylene rubber (EPR).

name: FLEXIBLE 65408aee0771fa340bc53bd6
info:
Flexible wires, also known as flexible 65408aee0771fa340bc53bd6 or flex wires, are electrical 65408aee0771fa340bc53bd6 designed to be highly flexible and bendable. They are commonly used in applications where the cable needs to be frequently moved, bent, or twisted without causing damage or loss of electrical performance.

Flexible wires are typically constructed with a stranded conductor made of multiple thin wires twisted together. This construction allows the wire to be more flexible and able to bend and move more easily than a solid wire. Flexible wires are used in a wide range of applications, including robotics, automation equipment, medical devices, and aerospace equipment.

name: COVERED CONDUCTORS
info:
Covered conductors, also known as insulated overhead conductors, are electrical conductors used in power transmission and distribution systems. They consist of a bare conductor, usually made of aluminium or copper, which is coated with a layer of insulation material.

One of the main benefits of covered conductors is increased safety. Because the conductor is coated with insulation, there is less risk of accidental contact with live electrical wires, which can be dangerous or even deadly.

name: SOLAR LED
info: Solar LED lights are outdoor lighting fixtures that use solar panels to convert sunlight into electricity, which is then used to power LED (light-emitting diode) bulbs. Solar LED lights are a popular choice for outdoor lighting because they are energy-efficient, environmentally friendly, and easy to install. Solar LED lights are a versatile and practical option for outdoor lighting, providing bright, reliable illumination while also reducing energy costs and environmental impact.

name: HIGH MAST
info:
High mast lighting is a type of outdoor lighting that uses tall poles to illuminate large areas, such as sports fields, highways, airports, and industrial parks. High mast lighting is designed to provide high levels of illumination over a large area, and is typically mounted on poles that range in height from 30 to 120 feet.

High mast lighting systems may also include control options such as photocells, timers, and motion 65408aee0771fa340bc53be2, which allow for the lights to be automatically turned on and off depending on the time of day or the presence of people or vehicles in the area.

name: LV MOTORS - 0.12 KW to 355KW
info: LV motors, or low voltage motors, are electric motors that are designed to operate at a voltage of less than 1000 volts. These motors are used in a wide range of industrial, commercial, and residential applications, such as pumps, fans, compressors, conveyors, and machine tools. They are commonly used in applications that require a high starting torque, such as pumps and compressors.

name: MV VOLTAGE - 120KW TO 1000KW
info: MV motors, or medium voltage motors, are electric motors that are designed to operate at voltages ranging. These motors are commonly used in industrial and commercial applications, such as pumps, compressors, fans, and conveyor systems that require high-power output

name: STANDARD & NON-STANDARD MOTORS
info:
Standard motors are electric motors that are designed and manufactured according to industry standards, such as the International Electrotechnical Commission (IEC) or the National Electrical Manufacturers Association (NEMA). These motors have a specific set of characteristics, such as size, shape, and power rating, that make them suitable for a wide range of applications in various industries.

Non-standard motors, on the other hand, are electric motors that are designed and manufactured to meet specific requirements that are not covered by industry standards. These motors may have unique features or specifications that are tailored to meet the needs of a particular application or industry.

name: INDUSTRIAL SWITCHGEAR
info: Industrial switchgear refers to the equipment used to control, protect, and isolate electrical power systems in industrial and commercial settings. Switchgear is typically used to manage the distribution of electrical power from a primary power source, such as a generator or utility grid, to various loads, such as motors, pumps, and lighting systems. Switchgear typically includes a combination of components, such as circuit breakers, disconnect switches, fuses, relays, transformers, and control panels.

name: CONTACTORS
info:
Contactors are electrical switching devices that are used to control the flow of electrical power to equipment or machinery. They are commonly used in industrial and commercial applications to control motors, lighting, heating, and other electrical loads.

Contactors are available in a range of sizes and configurations, from small contactors that can handle a few amps of current, to large contactors that can handle hundreds or even thousands of amps. They may also be designed for specific voltage levels and frequency ranges.

name: HV/LV HARMONIC FILTERS
info:
HV/LV harmonic filters are electronic devices used to reduce the level of harmonics in electrical power systems. Harmonics are frequencies that are multiples of the fundamental frequency of an AC power system.

In industrial and commercial settings, harmonic filters are commonly used in applications such as data centers, manufacturing plants, and large office buildings. In power transmission and distribution systems, harmonic filters are used to maintain the stability of the power grid and prevent damage to sensitive electrical equipment.

name: FUSE TERMINALS
info: Fuse terminals are electronic components that are used to connect and secure fuses in electrical systems. Fuses are safety devices that protect electrical equipment and systems from damage caused by overcurrent or short-circuit conditions. Fuse terminals are available in a variety of styles and configurations, depending on the specific application and the type of fuse being used.

name: VCB PANEL
info: A VCB panel, also known as a Vacuum Circuit Breaker panel, is an electrical switchgear panel used to control and protect electrical power systems. The panel includes one or more vacuum circuit breakers that interrupt the flow of electrical current in the event of an overload, short-circuit, or other fault in the system.

name: LV VFD
info:
An LV VFD (Low Voltage Variable Frequency Drive) panel is an electrical control panel that contains a VFD, or variable frequency drive, that is designed to regulate the speed of an AC electric motor. VFDs are used to control the speed and torque of electric motors, allowing for precise control of industrial processes and improving energy efficiency.

LV VFD panels are typically used in industrial and commercial settings where precise motor control is required, such as in manufacturing plants, HVAC systems, and water treatment facilities.

name: LT/HT PANEL
info: LT HT (Low Tension High Tension) panels are electrical control panels used to distribute and control power in industrial and commercial applications. These panels are typically used in settings where high-voltage power is required, such as manufacturing plants, data centers, hospitals, and large commercial buildings. LT HT panels are critical components of modern industrial and commercial electrical systems, providing safe and reliable power distribution and control. They are designed to meet a wide range of power requirements, from small-scale applications to large-scale facilities, and can be customized to meet the specific needs of each application.

name: PSS PANEL
info: A PSS (Protection and Supervision System) panel is an electrical control panel used in power generation and distribution systems. The PSS panel is designed to protect and monitor the power system, providing real-time information on system performance and enabling operators to take corrective action in the event of faults or other system issues.

name: ACOUSTIC PU FOAMS
info:
Acoustic PU foam is a type of polyurethane foam that is specifically designed to reduce sound transmission and absorb noise. This type of foam is commonly used in various applications where sound control is necessary, such as in recording studios, home theaters, industrial and commercial buildings, and automotive and aerospace industries.

Acoustic PU foam works by absorbing sound waves through its porous structure, which reduces the amplitude of the sound waves and prevents them from reflecting back into the environment.

name: FUEL STORAGE TANK
info: A diesel storage tank is a container designed to store diesel fuel. These tanks can range in size from small portable containers to large tanks that hold thousands of gallons of fuel. Diesel storage tanks are commonly used in a variety of industries, including transportation, construction, and agriculture. Diesel storage tanks are also equipped with various safety features, such as pressure relief valves and alarms that alert operators to potential leaks or spills.

name: RF SHIELDED CHAMBER
info:
An RF-shielded chamber is a specially designed room or enclosure that is used to block electromagnetic interference (EMI) and radio frequency (RF) signals from entering or leaving the chamber. The walls, floor, and ceiling of the chamber are made of materials that are highly conductive and have high magnetic permeability, such as copper or aluminum, which act as a barrier to electromagnetic waves.

RF-shielded chambers are used in a variety of applications, including aerospace and defense, medical equipment testing, telecommunications, and electronics manufacturing.

name: VIBRATION ANALYZER & MONITORING
info:
Vibration Analyzer is a 2 channels portable vibration analyzer and balancer which is suitable for all kinds of rotating machines, such as motors, pumps, air compressors, windmills, gearboxes, steam turbines, generators, cooling towers, etc.

With the powerful Analysis software, we can manage the equipment database, monitor the trend of the state, analyze the abnormal cause, and generate the report.

name: LASER SHAFT ALIGNMENT
info: Laser shaft alignment is a process used to align the shafts of rotating machinery, such as motors, pumps, and fans. The process involves the use of a laser alignment tool, which emits a laser beam that is used to measure the alignment of the shafts. Laser shaft alignment is a highly accurate and precise method for aligning shafts, and it can help to reduce vibration, wear, and tear on the machinery. It can also help to improve the overall efficiency of the machinery and reduce energy consumption.

name: MOTOR CURRENT SIGNATURE ANALYZER
info: A motor current signature analyzer (MCSA) is a device used to analyze the current waveform of an electric motor to detect faults and potential problems. MCSA devices are commonly used in a variety of industries, including manufacturing, power generation, and transportation. They are often used as part of a predictive maintenance program to monitor the health of electric motors and identify potential problems before they lead to downtime or failure.

name: DYNAMIC BALANCING MACHINE
info:
A dynamic balancing machine is a specialized device used to balance rotating equipment, such as motors, fans, turbines, and crankshafts. These machines are designed to measure and correct any imbalances in the rotating components to ensure smooth and efficient operation.

Dynamic balancing machines come in a variety of sizes and types, depending on the application. Some machines are designed for small components, while others can handle large industrial equipment. They may use different methods for measuring vibrations and forces, such as accelerometers, laser 65408aee0771fa340bc53be2, or strain gauges.

name: OIL CONDITION MONITORING SYSTEM
info:
Fluid Intelligence’s vision is to change the way we use lubricant oils today. We help our customers to maximize their operational reliability and cut waste oil in half.

Lubrication costs heavy industry and logistics over $200bn annually and generates massive streams of waste oil as only a fraction of that can be re-refined. Even with all these efforts machines break down and generate unnecessary downtimes and costs.

name: PRESSURE GAUGE
info:
Pressure gauges are used in a wide variety of industries, including manufacturing, automotive, aerospace, and healthcare. They are commonly used to monitor and control pressure in pneumatic and hydraulic systems, as well as in steam boilers, refrigeration systems, and medical equipment.

There are several different types of pressure gauges available, including analog gauges, digital gauges, and differential pressure gauges.

name: TEMPERATURE SENSOR
info:
A temperature sensor is a device used to measure the temperature of a material or environment. It works by detecting changes in temperature and converting them into an electrical signal, which can be read and interpreted by a control system or other device.

Temperature 65408aee0771fa340bc53be2 are used in a wide range of applications, including industrial process control, food safety, environmental monitoring, and medical devices. Accurate temperature sensing is critical in many of these applications to ensure safety, efficiency, and product quality.

name: HIGH TEMPERATURE THERMOCOUPLE
info:
High-temperature thermocouples are used in industrial applications where high-temperature measurement is required, such as in furnaces, kilns, and gas turbines. Thermocouples work by measuring the voltage generated by two dissimilar metals that are joined together at the sensing end of the thermocouple. The voltage reading is then converted into a temperature reading using a thermocouple reference table.

These materials are used to create thermocouples with high-temperature ratings, such as Type J, K, E, T, N, and R thermocouples, which can measure temperatures up to 1200°C.

name: RTD
info:
RTD stands for Resistance Temperature Detector, which is a type of temperature sensor used to measure temperature. An RTD works by measuring the change in electrical resistance of a metal wire or film as temperature changes.

RTDs are known for their high accuracy and stability over a wide range of temperatures. They are commonly used in industrial and scientific applications, including temperature measurement in process control, environmental monitoring, and laboratory experiments.

name: MPI PRODUCT
info: Magnetic particle inspection (MPI) is a non-destructive testing technique used to detect surface and near-surface defects in ferromagnetic materials, such as iron, nickel, and cobalt. The technique is widely used in manufacturing, aerospace, and automotive industries to inspect metal parts and components for defects that could lead to failure or safety hazards. MPI is particularly effective in detecting surface-breaking defects, such as cracks, porosity, and laps, as well as subsurface defects that are close to the surface.

name: INSPECTION FOR METALS, RUBBERS & PLASTICS
info:
Supplied with magnetic and suction cup mounting bases, the wire encoder is easy to install on ferromagnetic and nonferromagnetic surfaces. It’s the tool of choice for training and procedure development, and the wire encoder can even be used on-site to perform inspections when using other scanners is impractical.

A wire encoder system is unique compared to most manual scanners as its core is fixed to the part so that it remains stationary as the user moves the probe.

name: MICROMETER
info:
A micrometer, also known as a micrometer screw gauge, is a precision measuring instrument used to measure the dimensions of small objects with high accuracy. It consists of a metal frame with a calibrated screw mechanism that moves a precision-ground spindle with a measuring anvil at the end.

They are commonly used to measure the thickness, diameter, or length of small parts, such as wires, screws, or bearings, with accuracy to within a few thousandths of an inch or hundredths of a millimeter. Micrometers come in various sizes and types, including outside micrometers, inside micrometers, depth micrometers, and digital micrometers.

name: MICROMETER HEAD
info:
A micrometer head, also known as a micrometer screw gauge head, is a component of a micrometer that contains the calibrated screw mechanism and the measuring spindle, but does not include the frame or scale.

Micrometer heads are commonly used in precision machining and manufacturing, where high-accuracy measurements are required on a regular basis. They can be used with a variety of measuring instruments and fixtures, such as height gauges, coordinate measuring machines, or custom jigs and fixtures.

name: HEIGHT MEASURING TOOL
info:
